title: Extended Component Reference
content:
# Extended Component Reference

2022-07-07 17:08

## Layout Navigation

|     |     |
| --- | --- |
| **Component Name** | **Function Description** |
| [Container](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_layout_container) | Make the style of all elements in the container more consistent, such as margins between elements. |
| [Title](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_layout_title) | Display the title of each page. |
| [List](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_layout-navigation_list) | List |
| [List-item](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_layout_list-term) | Customize items in a list. |
| [List-secondary](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_layout_secondlist) | Display the additional information on the right side of the list item. |
| [Tabs](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_layout-navigation_tabs) | Tabs allow the user to switch between different views in landscape. |
| [VTabs](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_layout-navigation_vtabs) | Vtabs allow the user to switch between different views in vertical. |
| [Card](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_layout-navigation_card) | Card. |
| [Coupon](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_layout_coupon) | Display the coupon, red packet, and ticket that can be redeemed by users. |
| [Grid](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_layout-navigation_grid) | Grid. |
| [Steps](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_layout-navigation_steps) | Show the progress bar as per the steps. |
| [Footer](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_layout-navigation_footer) | Show the page footer. |
| [Terms](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_layout_terms) | Users must agree with terms before using or activating the service. |
| [Flex](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_layout-navigation_flex) | Flex layout. |
| [Pagination](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_layout-navigation_pagination) | Pagination. |
| [Collapse](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_layout-navigation_collapse) | Collapse panel. |

## Float

|     |     |
| --- | --- |
| **Component Name** | **Function Description** |
| [Popover](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_floating-layer_popover) | Popover. |
| [Filter](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_floating-layer_filter) | Use as tab filter. |
| [Modal](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_floating-layer_modal) | Dialog box. |
| [Popup](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_floating-layer_popup) | Popup menu. |

## Result

|     |     |
| --- | --- |
| **Component Name** | **Function Description** |
| [PageResult](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_result_pageresult) | Page result. |
| [Message](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_result_message) | Message. |

## Guide

|     |     |
| --- | --- |
| **Component Name** | **Function Description** |
| [Tips](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_prompt-guide_tips) | Tips. |
| [Notice](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_prompt-guide_notice) | Notice. |
| [Badge](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_prompt-guide_badge) | Red dot, number or text used to tell the user the number of things or updates to be handled. |
| [Tag](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_prompt-guide_tag) | Highlight the information, such as the warning. |
| [Mask](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_prompt-guide_mask) | Display the pop-up element with a mask. |
| [Guide](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_guide_guide) | Teach users to use features on a mask. |
| [Avatar](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_guide_avatar) | Display avatars. |

## Form

|     |     |
| --- | --- |
| **Component Name** | **Function Description** |
| [InputItem](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_form_inputitem) | Text input. |
| [Verify Code](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_form_verify-code) | Display the input box of the verification code. |
| [PickerItem](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_form_pickeritem) | Pick to input. |
| [Long password](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_form_password) | Display the input box for the password. |
| [Multi Liner](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_form_multi-liner) | Allow users to enter multiple lines of content in an input box. |
| [AmountInput](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_form_amountinput) | Input money number. |
| [Button](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_form_button) | Allow users to perform actions or make choices. |
| [Am-switch](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_form_am-switch) | Change the state on or off. |
| [SearchBar](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_form_searchbar) | Search box. |
| [AMRadio](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_form_amradio) | Allow users to select radio buttons. |
| [AMCheckBox](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_form_amcheckbox) | Multiple check box. |

## Gesture

|     |     |
| --- | --- |
| **Component Name** | **Function Description** |
| [SwipeAction](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_gesture_swipeaction) | Slide cell. |

## Other

|     |     |
| --- | --- |
| **Component Name** | **Function Description** |
| [Calendar](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_others_calendar) | Calendar. |
| [Stepper](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_others_stepper) | Stepper. |
| [AMIcon](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_others_amicon) | Icons. |
| [Alphabet](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_others_alphabet) | Arrange content in the alphabetical order. |
| [Loading](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_others_loading) | Display the loading animation. |

## Experience Mini Program

Developers can use the [Android Demo App](https://gw.alipayobjects.com/os/bmw-prod/c23b76e2-2fad-4d17-95ee-39d3000c80a4.apk) to scan the QR code shown in the extended component documents.
